edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.exceptions

Class WapResponseEntityExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
      • edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.exceptions.WapResponseEntityExceptionHandler

  • @ControllerAdvice
public class WapResponseEntityExceptionHandler
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
    This class is used as the global exception handler for the application.

    It converts all instances of WapException to a specific error format, and leaves the rest up to springs default implementation.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

      • handleConflict

        @ExceptionHandler(value=WapException.class)
protected org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> handleConflict(WapException ex,
                                                                                                                                org.springframework.web.context.request.WebRequest webRequest,
                                                                                                                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Handles exceptions for all instances of WapException.
        Parameters:
        ex - The exception that occurred
        webRequest - The webRequest associated with the originating HTTP request
        request - The httpServletRequest associated with the originating HTTP request
        Returns:
        The ResponseEntity that is used to send the error to the client
